  ```go
  import "github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf"
  
  &cdktf.TerraformModuleOptions {
  	DependsOn: *[]github.com/hashicorp/terraform-cdk-go/cdktf.ITerraformDependable,

  }
  ```
